title: Ensolite MLC Black (PVC/NBR)
fileContent: Typical Properties of Ensolite® MLC Black Polymer PVC/NBR ASTMD1056 Classification 2C1 ASTM D1056 Suffix Compliances C1, F1, M ASTM D6576 Classification Type IIA/B Soft Physical Property Test Method   Result (USUnits)   Result (Metric Units) Density ASTMD1056 3.5-5.5 pcf .064-.088 g/cm 3 Compression Deflection 25% ASTM D1056 2 –3.5 psi 13.8 –24.1 kPa CompressionSet 50% ASTM D1056 40% Max 40% Max Water Absorption ASTM D1056 10% Max 10% Max Tensile Strength ASTMD412 40 psi Min 276 kPaMin Elongation ASTM D412 100% Min 100% Min Fluid Immersion ASTM D1056 250% max 250% max CD after Oven Aging ASTM D1056 30% Max 30% Max Flammability FMVSS-302 Pass @ .069” or Thicker Service Temperature -40 to 200 F Thermal Conductivity ASTM C518 K Factor .236 Disclaimer: This information is furnished as a guide for selecting materials.
